content.body: Alexander Kalenik: Did you have a chance to look at https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9148#issuecomment-1610989949 ? I would love to get your implementer experience-informed opinion, before I go making changes.
content.formatted_body: Alexander Kalenik: Did you have a chance to look at https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9148#issuecomment-1610989949 ? I would love to get your implementer experience-informed opinion, before I go making changes.

content.body: Domenic: do you know which sites would benefit from `origin-agent-cluster` (regardless of its default value)?
content.formatted_body: Domenic: do you know which sites would benefit from origin-agent-cluster (regardless of its default value)?

content.body:
> <@zcorpan:mozilla.org> Domenic: do you know which sites would benefit from `origin-agent-cluster` (regardless of its default value)?

Google Workspace uses it heavily to hint for process isolation among its many same-site cross-origin pages.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @zcorpan:mozilla.org
Domenic: do you know which sites would benefit from origin-agent-cluster (regardless of its default value)?
Google Workspace uses it heavily to hint for process isolation among its many same-site cross-origin pages.
